alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Delaware, Sullivan, Wayne and Pike Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong line of showers extending from near Equinunk to near Blooming Grove to Wind Gap. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fallsburg, Bushkill, Monticello, Lackawaxen, Blooming Grove, Honesdale, Liberty, Bethel, Paupack and Damascus. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 96 and 116. Interstate 84 between 17 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
